meanings.definition: Make it easier or possible for (someone) to do something by offering one's services or resources.
meanings.sent1: I will help you carry the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: Can you help me find my lost keys?
meanings.sent3: The superhero dog offered to help the cat climb the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words helped mend the broken friendship.
meanings.sent5: The flashlight's beam helped guide us through the dark cave.

meanings.definition: Serve someone by giving them assistance or support.
meanings.sent1: She always helps her little brother tie his shoes.
meanings.sent2: The nurse helped the patient walk down the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The friendly robot offered to help the lost astronaut find his spaceship.
meanings.sent4: His encouraging words helped lift her spirits.
meanings.sent5: The map helped us navigate through the maze of streets.

meanings.sent1: Adding more water will help the plants grow.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard will help you do well on the test.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand helped turn the frog back into a prince.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude helped brighten the gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The new paint color helped transform the room into a cozy space.
